txt.en: 'What we need most of all is milk for the child, or if worse comes to worst, meat for the spit. I tended a goat herd for Byre Tor, and I'm sure some are still alive.\n\n'Go out and catch some of the goats, and bring them back. They're good creatures, and they'll follow ye.'
Edhild gives the goats a fond smile.\n\n'Poor frightened dears! We'll do our best not to eat ye, little goats. We can keep each other alive, eh?'
Edhild believes the goat-herd of Byre Tor can still be found nearby.

Tame goats from the herd can be found in the northern High Knolls near the refugees' cave.

You should catch some of the frightened goats from the Byre Tor herd and lead them back to the cave.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: The goats will find their way if you become separated.</rgb>
The refugees are in the cave on the peak north of Byre Tor in the High Knolls.\n\nYou should lead the goats you caught to the refugees' cave.
Edhild is in the refugees' cave in the northern High Knolls.\n\nYou should speak with Edhild.
Lead the goats to the cave (they will find their way if you become separated)
